item.title: HomeBridge setup
item.description: HomeBridge setup and supported accessories. Homebridge instalation. Simple way to install it, is using docker and docker compose. version: '2' services: homebridge: image: oznu/homebridge:ubuntu restart: always network_mode: host environment: - PGID=1000 - PUID=1000 - HOMEBRIDGE_CONFIG_UI=1 - HOMEBRIDGE_CONFIG_UI_PORT=8581 - TZ=Canberra/Australia volumes: - ./volumes/homebridge:/homebridge For more ways to install and for configuration options head to the official docs of HomeBridge here.
